A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Horrible\, horrible cash grab from Disney. Sub par remake of Empire Strikes Back\, fails on almost any level. I don't know what strings Disney had pulled to buy almost universal journalistic praise but to anyone who has ever seen more than one SW movie (or any movie\, for that matter) it is clear that this is an below average movie at best moments and tremendous disaster at worst.\n1 star\, because I can't give 0.\nBoycott Disney's Star Wars!
